Empower Your Business with Seamless PaymentsTrusted by hundreds of African companies, from agile startups to industry giants, our Payment Solution revolutionizes financial transactions. Our state-of-the-art platform and APIs enable businesses to securely accept payments and disburse funds. Streamline your operations, fuel growth, and thrive in the digital economy with our comprehensive payment ecosystem.

With KentaPay, companies efficiently manage and grow their operations in the dynamic landscape of online business"

Built for Developers, Scaled for Enterprises
Accelerate Development with Our Robust, Developer Friendly APIs Key Benefits:
  • Rapid Integration: Get up and running quickly with clear documentation and intuitive APIs
  • Unified Solution: Access multiple payment gateways and rails through a single integration
  • Global Reach: Tap into international markets with support for multiple currencies and payment methods
  • Scalability: Built to handle high-volume transactions as your business grows
  • Security First: Bank-grade security measures to protect sensitive financial data
  • Customization: Flexible APIs allow you to tailor the solution to your specific needs

Whether you’re a startup or an established enterprise, our platform adapts to your requirements, enabling you to ship faster and smarter.

Ready to simplify your payment infrastructure? Explore our API documentation and start building today.

Why Partner With Us
African Fintech Expertise
With 15+ years of experience across 27 African countries, we offer deep insights into diverse financial landscapes. Our support for 13 local currencies and various payment methods makes us the ideal partner for navigating Africa’s dynamic financial ecosystem.
Powerful, Scalable Technology
Our all-in-one platform integrates payments, disbursements, and financial management. Equipped with advanced APIs, fraud detection, and scalable infrastructure, we ensure security and growth alongside your business.
Proven Performance & Reliability
Processing over 1.5 million transactions monthly, handling $50M in transaction volume, we deliver high uptime and fast processing speeds, backed by a strong performance record in the African fintech space.
Customer-Centric Solutions
We offer a customizable platform and personalized support, ensuring a tailored approach for businesses of any size, with flexible services to meet your evolving needs.
Who We Serve
Freelancers
Empower your independent career with seamless payment collection and management. Our platform simplifies invoicing, enables multiple payment options, and provides clear financial reporting, allowing you to focus on your craft while we handle the financial logistics.
Businesses
Streamline your operations with our comprehensive financial solution. From accepting payments to disbursements, our platform integrates seamlessly with your existing systems, providing the tools you need to scale efficiently across Africa.
Merchants
Boost your sales and customer satisfaction with our robust payment gateway. Accept a wide range of payment methods, benefit from real-time transaction processing, and gain valuable insights into your sales patterns. Our solution adapts to both physical stores and e-commerce platforms, ensuring you never miss a sale.
Financial Institutions
Enhance your service offerings and operational efficiency with our cutting-edge fintech infrastructure. Our APIs and white-label solutions allow you to rapidly deploy new financial products, expand your digital capabilities, and tap into the growing African market while maintaining compliance with local regulations.
